00030 void
00031 ears::Model1::init()
00032 {
00033   LOG( logINFO ) << "Initializing Model 1";
00034   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "version 0.9 (last mod. 2009-09-09)";
00035   
00036   // smoothing 
00037   initSmoothing();
00038   
00039   init_ = true;
00040 }

00042 
00043 
00045 void
00046 ears::Model1::setSmoothingAuto()
00047 {
00048   double sum_ne;
00049   int entityNum = 0;
00050   for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < entities_.entityNum(); entityID++ ) {    
00051     // we ignore entities without any associated documents
00052     if ( entities_.entityDocNum( entityID ) > 0 ) {
00053       lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter* entityCounter 
00054         = this->entityCounter( entityID );      
00055       sum_ne += (double) entityCounter->sum(); // n(e)
00056       entityNum++;
00057       delete entityCounter;
00058     }
00059   }
00060   
00061   // smoothingParam_ holds Dirichlet's beta, where \beta = (\sum_e n(e)) / |e|
00062   smoothingParam_ = (double) sum_ne / entityNum;  
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 
00068 ears::ASSOCRES_T
00069 ears::Model1::scoreAll()
00070 {
00071   ASSOCRES_T pqe_all;
00072   double lambda = smoothingParam_; // for J-M smoothing
00073   double beta = smoothingParam_; // for Dirichlet smoothing
00074   int entityNum = entities_.entityNum();
00075   int queryNum = queries_.queryNum();
00076   
00077   if ( !init_ ) {
00078     LOG( logERROR ) << "Model needs to be initialized first";
00079     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );                
00080   }
00081     
00082   LOG( logINFO ) << "Calculating topic-entity associations";
00083 
00084   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Constructing collection Language Model";
00085   lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter* collCounter 
00086     = new lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter( index_ ); 
00087   lemur::langmod::UnigramLM *collModel 
00088     = new lemur::langmod::MLUnigramLM( *collCounter, index_.termLexiconID() );
00089   
00090   // caching
00091   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Caching collection probabilities"; 
00092 
00093   // store p(t) for all query terms in a map
00094   std::map< lemur::api::TERMID_T, double > pt_cache;
00095   for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queryNum; qID++ ) {
00096     const DISTR_T& ptq = queries_.query( qID );
00097     for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = ptq.begin();
00098          term_it != ptq.end(); term_it++ ) {
00099       
00100       const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; // t
00101       pt_cache[termID] = collModel->prob( termID ); // p(t)
00102     }
00103   }
00104   
00105   // +++
00106   // calculate p(q|e) for all entities and queries
00107   // +++ 
00108   for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < entityNum; entityID++ ) {
00109     LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Entity #" << (entityID+1) << "/" << entityNum
00110       << " (" << entities_.entityID( entityID ) << ")";
00111     
00112     std::vector< double > pqe; // p(q|e) for entity e
00113     pqe.resize( queryNum, 0.0 );
00114     
00115     // build entity language model
00116     int entityDocNum = entities_.entityDocNum( entityID );
00117     
00118     if ( entityDocNum > 0 ) {
00119       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Creating model based on " 
00120         << entityDocNum << " associated documents";
00121       
00122       lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter* entityCounter 
00123         = this->entityCounter( entityID );      
00124       double ne = (double) entityCounter->sum(); // n(e)
00125       
00126       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Scoring queries";
00127       for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queryNum; qID++ ) {
00128         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "  Query #" << (qID+1) << "/" << queryNum
00129           << " ('" << queries_.queryID( qID ) << "')";
00130 
00131         double score = 0.0;
00132         const DISTR_T& q = queries_.query( qID ); // q
00133         
00134         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    log p(q|e) = ";
00135 
00136         for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00137              term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {
00138           
00139           const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; // t
00140           const double& ptq = term_it->second; // p(t|q)
00141           double& pt = pt_cache[termID]; // p(t)                    
00142           double nte = entityCounter->count( termID ); // n(t,e)
00143           double pte; // p(t|\theta_e)
00144           
00145           // Jelinek-Mercer smoothing
00146           // p(t|\theta_e) = (1-\lambda) * (n(t,e)/n(e)) + \lambda * p(t)
00147           if ( smoothingMethod_ == "jm" ) 
00148             pte = (double) (1.0 - lambda) * (nte / ne) + lambda * pt;           
00149           // Dirichlet smoothing
00150           // p(t|\theta_e) = (n(t,e) + \beta * p(t)) / (n(e) + \beta)
00151           if ( smoothingMethod_ == "dirichlet" ) 
00152             pte = ((double) nte + beta * pt) / ((double) ne + beta);
00153           
00154           // log p(q|e) += p(t|q) * log ( p(t|\theta_e) )
00155           score += ptq * log( pte );
00156           
00157           LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "      + p('" << index_.term( termID ) << "'|q) "
00158             << "[" << ptq << "] * log( p(t|e) [" << pte << "] )";
00159           
00160         } // query term t (termID)
00161         
00162         // record p(q|e)
00163         pqe[qID] = exp( score );
00164         
00165         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "      = " << score;
00166         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    p(q|e) = " << pqe[qID];
00167         
00168       } // query q (qID)
00169 
00170       delete entityCounter;
00171     }
00172     // no associated documents -- entity scores 0 on all queries
00173     else {      
00174       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "No associated documents";
00175     }
00176     
00177     // record scores
00178     pqe_all.push_back( pqe );    
00179     
00180   } // entity e (entityID)
00181   
00182   delete collCounter;
00183   delete collModel;
00184   
00185   LOG( logINFO ) << "Model 1 completed";
00186 
00187   return pqe_all;
00188 }
00189 
00190 
00191 
00193 lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter* 
00194 ears::Model1::entityCounter( const ID_T& entityID )
00195 {
00196   lemur::api::IndexedRealVector irv;
00197   const DISTR_T& pde = entities_.entityDocs( entityID );
00198 
00199   for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator it=pde.begin(); it != pde.end(); it++ ) 
00200     irv.PushValue( it->first, it->second );
00201   
00202   int docNum = entities_.entityDocNum( entityID );
00203   lemur::api::PseudoFBDocs* entityDocs = 
00204     new lemur::api::PseudoFBDocs( irv, docNum, false );  
00205   
00206   lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter* counter
00207     = new lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter( *entityDocs, index_ );
00208   
00209   irv.clear();
00210   delete entityDocs;
00211   
00212   return counter;
00213 }
